hotels.vendor_name: Crowne Plaza Riyadh Rdc Hotel & Convention
hotels.title: Stylish Riyadh City Break in the Heart of Digital City with Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Enter the future and experience Digital City from the comfort of your metropolitan oasis, with a stay at Crowne Plaza Riyadh RDC Hotel & Convention, an IHG Hotel. With the awe-inspiring city of Ridyah at your doorstep, explore all that the dazzling capital of Saudi Arabia has to offer. Discover world-class retail, smarter services and advanced technology at the world-class Digital City. During your stay, retreat to KOI for Japanese-Peruvian fine dining or laze by the hotel’s glamorous outdoor pool.

hotels.title: Elegant Riyadh Self-Contained Apartments & Suites with Restaurant & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Discover a sanctuary of luxury in Riyadh’s Al Sahafah district, where modernity intertwines with cultural heritage at this towering 35-storey abode. Savour jaw-dropping views from the rooftop infinity pool overlooking the city's skyline and indulge in wellness at the state-of-the-art fitness centre, while children can stay busy with activities at the Falcon Kids' Club. Culinary enthusiasts will relish the diverse dining options at Ramla Terraza, featuring renowned establishments like CLAP, Brute, Iris Café and Jones the Grocer. After a day of exploring Riyadh's nearby cultural gems and glitzy malls, retreat to your plush apartment or suite, equipped with all chic amenities for a truly luxurious city break.

hotels.title: Elegant Riyadh Escape Steps from Kingdom Centre with Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Retreat to Saudi Arabia’s vibrant capital with a stay at this elegant hotel in the heart of Riyadh. Just steps from the iconic Kingdom Centre, the hotel features stylish rooms, a heated indoor pool and a modern fitness centre for your relaxation. Enjoy international cuisine at La Croisette or unwind with a coffee in the cosy lounge. With top attractions like Al Faisaliah Mall, the National Museum,and the historic Masmak Fortress nearby, you're perfectly positioned to discover the city's rich culture. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, the hotel’s prime location makes it the ideal base for your Riyadh stay.

hotels.vendor_name: InterContinental Durrat Al Riyadh Resort & Spa
hotels.title: Five-Star Riyadh Oasis with Infinity Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Surrounded by a lush verdant oasis, the five-star InterContinental Durrat Al Riyadh Resort & Spa, an IHG Hotel, is an opulent haven of stylish and exquisite rooms and suites hidden amid 154,000sqm of sprawling greenery. Visit the Desert Palm restaurant to experience world-class dining that blends traditional and global flavours, indulge in a sweet treat at the Oasis terrace cafe overlooking the infinity edge pool, or reinvigorate yourself at the spa or fully equipped fitness centre.

hotels.title: North Riyadh Mövenpick Residences with Onsite Dining, Outdoor Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Mövenpick Hotel and Residences Riyadh puts you right where the magic happens in Saudi Arabia's dynamic capital. You're positioned to soak up Riyadh's incredible transformation, with the Kingdom's business districts, cultural landmarks and shopping destinations all within easy reach. Melt your stress away at the spa, enjoy cutting-edge fitness facilities, or relax in the pool. Indulge in a range of flavours at several restaurants, from international culinary delights to fine-dining experiences, all with Mövenpick's legendary Swiss hospitality.

hotels.title: Five-Star Riyadh Arabian Escape with Renowned Sky-High Restaurant
hotels.description: Set in the vibrant Al Olaya District of Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, you’ll find the five-star Mandarin Oriental Al Faisaliah, Riyadh - a luxurious haven of timeless elegance, opulent interiors, gourmet dining and exceptional service. Experience the epitome of luxurious hospitality at this exquisite hotel perfectly positioned near the city's best sights. Be sure to visit each of the nine restaurants for a unique and stylish dining experience, including authentic international dishes at La Brasserie, visit The Globe - the iconic golden sphere atop Al Faisaliah Tower - for a sky-high experience or sip on refreshing cocktails at the stylish Mandarin Lounge. Later, visit the Men's Health Club or indulge like never before at the ladies-only Al Faisalian Spa, where a 16-metre indoor pool and a fully-equipped fitness centre await.
